channel.title: Comments on: Graham Coxon’s guitar techniques

item.title: By: Fergal
item.dc:creator: Fergal
item.description:
youtube... and blurcast.tv
it's amazing, there's normally only him playing guitar, but he makes it sound like there are two or three guitarists on stage, the way he plays both rhythm and lead simultaneously...
oh, and happy christmas...
item.content:encoded:
youtube… and blurcast.tv

it’s amazing, there’s normally only him playing guitar, but he makes it sound like there are two or three guitarists on stage, the way he plays both rhythm and lead simultaneously…

oh, and happy christmas…

item.title: By: fernando
item.dc:creator: fernando
item.description: thanks a lot... where can i find videos of he at live ? thanks
item.content:encoded: thanks a lot… where can i find videos of he at live ? thanks
